Class SubaccountController

  • java.lang.Object

public class SubaccountController
extends java.lang.Object
    The controller that deals with all the admin sub-account pages

      • managePost

        @PostMapping(value="/admin/manage/{pathid}")
public java.lang.String managePost(@Valid @ModelAttribute
                                                                                @Valid AccountForm accountForm,
                                                                                org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result,
                                                                                @ModelAttribute(value="subAccount")
                                                                                AccountWrapper subAccount,
                                                                                @ModelAttribute(value="account")
                                                                                AccountWrapper account,
                                                                                org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        Handles POST requests to the manage account page, updates the username, email and roles based on the form contents
        Parameters:
        accountForm - the form that should be submitted in the request
        result - the results of the validation on the form above
        subAccount - the account being managed
        account - the account wrapper for the logged in user
        model - holder for model attributes
        Returns:
        the path to the manage account page

      • getAccount

        @ModelAttribute(value="subAccount")
private AccountWrapper getAccount(@ModelAttribute(value="account")
                                                                      AccountWrapper account,
                                                                      @PathVariable(value="pathid")
                                                                      long pathid,
                                                                      org.springframework.ui.Model model)
                                                               throws AccountOwner,
                                                                      AccountNotFound
        Gets the account wrapper for the account where the id equals the "pathid" attribute in the URL
        Parameters:
        account - the account object of the current user
        pathid - the account id from the path variable
        model - holder for model attributes
        Returns:
        the sub account wrapper
        Throws:
        AccountOwner - if the sub account is actually the account of the current user
        AccountNotFound - if the account was not found
